amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $18.9 million in funding for the Military Construction, Army portion of the OCO account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the paragraph providing funding for Military Construction, Army contained in title IV.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 52 - 372 (Roll no. 217).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 52 - 372 (Roll no. 217).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
